name: Ansatsu Kyoushitsu Koro-sensei Daihouimou!!
overview: Assassination Classroom: Grand Siege on Korosensei (Ansatsu Kyōshitsu: Koro-sensei Dai Hōimō in Japanese) is a game based on the Anime & Manga series, Assasination Classroom, released in 2015. In this game, the player plays as the students trying to capture and kill Korosensei. Karasuma-Sensei and Koro-Sensei are the ones who narrate the video and explain the game so you can understand the instructions. The game has "comical assassin action" vibes and you can choose your own avatar, or more precisely, choose the student of class 3-E you wish to be. You can interact with other characters/students and plot against Koro-sensei. Playing this game can be fun because you receive the interactive experience while going after Koro-sensei and laying down traps.
